detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.
Trunks in stretch mesh with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long skirt in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with a high, elasticated, frill-trimmed waist and high slits in the sides. Short jersey underskirt.
Short dress in sturdy cotton jersey with an appliqué at the top, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and a wide, smocked seam at the waist.
Short, 5-pocket denim shorts with a high waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Short shorts in a glossy weave with wide elastication at the waist and an embroidered motif on one leg. Contrasting colour fabric stripes down the sides and short slits at the hems.
Short, oversized T-shirt dress in cotton jersey with a print motif with embroidery on the front, large patch front pockets, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves.

Feather Soft. Low-rise jeggings in softly draping, ultra-light denim that moulds to the body for a feather-light feel. Fake front pockets, real back pockets, a fake fly and wide ribbing at the waist for a good fit over the tummy.
Cap in cotton twill with embroidery on the front and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Cap in cotton twill with embroidery on the front and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Off-the-shoulder, calf-length dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave with smocking at the top, short, wide sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Wallet chain in metal ball chain with a carabiner hook and keyring at one end and a carabiner hook at the other. Length 54 cm.
Earrings with shell-shaped pendants. Length approx. 4.7 cm.
Earrings with shell-shaped pendants. Length approx. 4.7 cm.
Earrings with shell-shaped pendants. Length approx. 4.7 cm.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Short, multi-strand necklace with plastic beads. Adjustable length 47-56 cm.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable, pile-lined hood and zip with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams, a detachable, pile-lined hood and zip with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Pile lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges, a concealed silicone trim at the top and long sleeves.

Fitted, quilted, lightweight jacket with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front and front pockets. Filling 90% down and 10% feathers. Supplied with a practical storage bag with an elasticated drawstring. Size of bag 11x24.5 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sleeveless, V-neck jumpsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with details in ventilating mesh. Low cut with horizontal straps at the back, and ankle-length legs.
Short yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and thumbholes at the cuffs.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Kaftan in soft, airy jersey with a V-neck, short sleeves and detachable tie belt at the waist.

Trenchcoat in a soft weave with a small stand-up collar, lapels and a double-layered yoke. Long, raglan sleeves, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Ankle-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a concealed drawstring waist with a concealed key pocket, legs with ventilating mesh sections and a zip at the hems. The tights are made partly from recycled polyester.
Adjustable on-ear headphones with ears at the top with glittery sections. Designed to fit mobile phones with a 3.5 mm socket. Length of wire approx. 120 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in patterned twill made from viscose and Tencel™ lyocell with decorative trims. Stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Side pockets and a twisted tie belt at the waist. Lined.

Double-breasted coat in a sturdy weave made from a wool blend with wide notch lapels, press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Wide belt at the waist with a press-stud fastening, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short coat in sturdy faux fur with a large collar, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Short coat in sturdy faux fur with a large collar, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Chelsea boots in grained imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Patterned pyjama top and leggings in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with frills on the shoulders and leggings with an elasticated waist.
Patterned pyjama top and leggings in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with frills on the shoulders and leggings with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut jacket in a crêpe weave with sequined embroidery, a small stand-up collar and no fasteners. Lined.
Trousers in soft, striped cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in a crêpe weave with a lace yoke, round neckline, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck, and a straight-cut hem.
Coat in soft faux fur with notch lapels, hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Detachable tie belt in imitation leather. Lined.
Faux fur jacket with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Faux fur jacket with a collar, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.

Longer, padded jacket in cotton twill with a detachable, lined hood, two-way zip at the front and an extra zip at the top for a wider neckline. Flap front pockets with concealed press-studs, zipped side pockets and a zipped chest pocket. Concealed drawstring at the waist and an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Lined. Filling 70% down and 30% feathers.
Fitted, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a double frill trim in woven fabric and elastication at the top.
Sleeveless top in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small, frilled collar that is gathered at the front. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Sleeveless top in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small, frilled collar that is gathered at the front. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Lined.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Shirt in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
